comments.body: Since `App` comes with caveats both Scala [2.12](https://www.scala-lang.org/api/2.12.10/scala/App.html) and Scala [2.13](https://www.scala-lang.org/api/2.13.1/scala/App.html) I would suggest to stick to simply having a `main` method.
Fair enough, but we use this everywhere; I'd like to change it everywhere at once (at the same time as making `Runner` return a `Resource`).
